description: Regional Trade Agreements per pair of countries and year
Most Favoured Nation tarrifs (Year, Reporter and Commodity Code)
Minimum and maximum years with available data
Reporter trade at aggregated level (Year and Reporter), raw trade flows (i.e. with transportation costs)
Reporter trade at commodity level (Year, Reporter and Commodity Code), raw trade flows (i.e. with transportation costs)
Reporter-Partner trade at aggregated level (Year, Reporter and Partner), raw trade flows (i.e. with transportation costs)
Reporter-Partner trade at commodity level (Year, Reporter, Partner and Commodity Code), raw trade flows (i.e. with transportation costs)

Reporter-Partner trade at commodity level (Year, Section Code, Reporter, Partner and Commodity Code, same as ‘yrpc’ table but partioned differently to visualize products rather than countries),  raw trade flows (i.e. with transportation costs)
Reporter trade at aggregated level (Year and Reporter), imputed trade flows (i.e. without transportation costs)
Reporter trade at commodity level (Year, Reporter and Commodity Code), imputed trade flows (i.e. without transportation costs)
Reporter-Partner trade at aggregated level (Year, Reporter and Partner), imputed trade flows (i.e. without transportation costs)
Reporter-Partner trade at commodity level (Year, Reporter, Partner and Commodity Code), imputed trade flows (i.e. without transportation costs)

Reporter-Partner trade at commodity level (Year, Section Code, Reporter, Partner and Commodity Code, same as ‘yrpc’ table but partioned differently to visualize products rather than countries), imputed trade flows (i.e. without transportation costs)
